name: 737 CDU - Control Display Unit
description:
############# works with Prosim737 ####################

checkout Prosim´s website: http://prosim-ar.com/

This App is designed to use with the Simulator Software Prosim737 CDU.
You can turn your iPhone or iPad into a CDU to use it in your own Flightsimulator.
The App communicates via TCP Generics Ports to an Instance of the Prosim737 CDU.
Just enter the IP address of your PC where your CDU is running and enter the Port you have entered in the settings of the CDU on your PC.
